TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlyArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ReadOnlyArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ReadOnlyArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 当应用于 Windows 运行时组件中的数组参数时，指定传递到该参数的数组的内容仅用于输入。

span.span: When applied to an array parameter in a Windows Runtime component, specifies that the contents of the array that is passed to that parameter are used only for input.

summary.span: 调用方期望此数组不因调用而更改。

span.span: The caller expects the array to be unchanged by the call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的数组参数你[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]组件通过值进行传递 (`ByVal`在 Visual Basic 中)，你必须对其应用以下属性之一：If an array parameter in your [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component is passed by value (`ByVal` in Visual Basic), you must apply one of the following attributes to it: - 应用属性如果你想要用于仅输入数组的内容。Apply the attribute if you intend the contents of the array to be used for input only. - 应用属性如果你想要使用仅用于输出的数组的内容 （即，该方法设置数组的内容但不会读取）。Apply the attribute if you intend the contents of the array to be used for output only (that is, the method sets the contents of the array but does not read them). 将这两个属性应用于参数导致的错误。Applying both attributes to a parameter causes an error. 有关详细信息，其中包括标准模式进行更改到一个数组，请参阅[将数组传递给 Windows 运行时组件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=251026)Windows 开发人员中心中。For more information, including the standard pattern for making changes to an array, see [Passing arrays to a Windows Runtime component](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=251026) in the Windows Dev Center. > [!IMPORTANT] > 参数具有属性行为也会有所不同具体取决于是否以本机代码还是托管的代码编写调用方。Parameters that have the attribute behave differently depending on whether the caller is written in native code or managed code. 如果调用方是本机代码 （JavaScript 或 Visual c + + 组件扩展），在调用跨越应用程序二进制接口 (ABI) 边界时复制数组。If the caller is native code (JavaScript or Visual C++ component extensions), the array is copied when the call crosses the application binary interface (ABI) boundary. 元素在必要时会进行转换。Elements are converted if necessary. 因此，方法对只可输入数组进行的任何意外更改都对调用方不可见。Therefore, any accidental changes the method makes to an input-only array are not visible to the caller. > > 如果调用方托管代码中，数组不会复制。If the caller is managed code, the array is not copied. 原始数组可供调用的方法，因为它处于.NET Framework 中的任何方法调用中。The original array is available to the called method, as it would be in any method call in the .NET Framework. 数组内容在 .NET Framework 代码中是可变的，因此方法对数组进行的任何更改都对调用方可见。Array contents are mutable in .NET Framework code, so any changes the method makes to the array are visible to the caller. 务必记住，因为它会影响为编写单元测试这一点[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]组件。This is important to remember because it affects unit tests written for a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component. 如果在托管代码中编写测试，则数组的内容会在测试过程中似乎是可变的。If the tests are written in managed code, the contents of an array will appear to be mutable during testing. 将此特性应用于具有的参数或导出模块时，属性将导致错误。Applying this attribute to a parameter that has the or attribute causes an error when the module is exported. 应用到该属性`out`参数也会导致错误。Applying the attribute to an `out` parameter also causes an error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
